## Background

I am a 6th generation rancher who loves his family and solving problems. Essentially, this is why I love business, analytics, and product management! At their core, each is centered around solving problems. My formal education has allowed me to apply my passion for problem solving and in a structured way and has enabled me to use new and powerful tool!
